name: Forge Madness
description:
Create different recipes on two sides by grabbing items from the ground or simply throwing them to the other side. if the object touches the ground it will change its color Controls -Move your character with W,A,S,D or Arrow keys -Space to grab or throw -Change your character with "E"

Made in Godot Engine with Wwise implementation
